dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Classes Without Boilerplate
dependent_to.name: py-attrs

dependent_to.description:
Biotite is your Swiss army knife for bioinformatics. Whether you want to
identify homologous sequence regions in a protein family or you would
like to find disulfide bonds in a protein structure: Biotite has the
right tool for you. This package bundles popular tasks in computational
molecular biology into a uniform Python library.
dependent_to.name: py-biotite

dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.
dependent_to.name: py-black

dependent_to.description:
Datashader is a data rasterization pipeline for automating the process
of creating meaningful representations of large amounts of data
dependent_to.name: py-datashader

dependent_to.description: Dynamically distribute a list of tasks over a pool of compute resources.
dependent_to.name: py-disbatch

dependent_to.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication
dependent_to.name: py-filelock

dependent_to.description:
Formulaic is a high-performance implementation of Wilkinson formulas for
Python.
dependent_to.name: py-formulaic

dependent_to.description: A specification for pythonic filesystems.
dependent_to.name: py-fsspec

dependent_to.description: Google Drive Public File/Folder Downloader.
dependent_to.name: py-gdown

dependent_to.description:
A Python library designed to make data analysis and visualization
seamless and simple.
dependent_to.name: py-geoviews

dependent_to.description: Modern, extensible Python project management
dependent_to.name: py-hatch

dependent_to.description:
hepstats is a library for statistical inference aiming to cover the
needs in High Energy Physics. It is part of the Scikit-HEP project.
dependent_to.name: py-hepstats

dependent_to.description: Units and constants in the HEP system of units.
dependent_to.name: py-hepunits

dependent_to.description: Pretty print of NumPy (and other) histograms to the console
dependent_to.name: py-histoprint

dependent_to.description:
A Python library designed to make data analysis and visualization
seamless and simple.
dependent_to.name: py-holoviews

dependent_to.description:
This modest package contains various common humanization utilities, like
turning a number into a fuzzy human readable duration ('3 minutes ago')
or into a human readable size or throughput. It works with python 2.7
and 3.3 and is localized to Russian, French, Korean and Slovak.
dependent_to.name: py-humanize

dependent_to.description: iniconfig: brain-dead simple parsing of ini files
dependent_to.name: py-iniconfig

dependent_to.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-jsonschema

dependent_to.description: The JSON Schema meta-schemas and vocabularies, exposed as a Registry.
dependent_to.name: py-jsonschema-specifications

dependent_to.description: Check for broken links in web sites.
dependent_to.name: py-linkchecker

dependent_to.description: MNE python project for MEG and EEG data analysis.
dependent_to.name: py-mne

dependent_to.description:
MNE-BIDS: Organizing MEG, EEG, and iEEG data according to the BIDS
specification and facilitating their analysis with MNE-Python.
dependent_to.name: py-mne-bids

dependent_to.description: Matplotlib styles for HEP
dependent_to.name: py-mplhep

dependent_to.description: Access a multitude of neuroimaging data formats
dependent_to.name: py-nibabel

dependent_to.description: Statistical learning for neuroimaging in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-nilearn

dependent_to.description: Use numba-compiled kernels from within Jax
dependent_to.name: py-numba4jax

dependent_to.description: Optimized Einsum: A tensor contraction order optimizer.
dependent_to.name: py-opt-einsum

dependent_to.description: A high level app and dashboarding solution for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-panel

dependent_to.description:
Param is a library providing Parameters: Python attributes extended to
have features such as type and range checking, dynamically generated
values, documentation strings, default values, etc., each of which is
inherited from parent classes if not specified in a subclass.
dependent_to.name: py-param

dependent_to.description:
Particle provides a pythonic interface to the Particle Data Group (PDG)
particle data tables and particle identification codes, with extended
particle information and extra goodies.
dependent_to.name: py-particle

dependent_to.description: Command line utility to show dependency tree of packages.
dependent_to.name: py-pipdeptree

dependent_to.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir"
dependent_to.name: py-platformdirs

dependent_to.description: Multiple dispatch in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-plum-dispatch

dependent_to.description:
PrettyTable is a simple Python library designed to make it quick and
easy to represent tabular data in visually appealing ASCII tables.
dependent_to.name: py-prettytable

dependent_to.description: JSON Referencing + Python.
dependent_to.name: py-referencing

dependent_to.description: Python implementations of commonly used sensitivity analysis methods.
dependent_to.name: py-salib

dependent_to.description:
scikit-build is an improved build system generator for CPython
C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It provides better support for
additional compilers, build systems, cross compilation, and locating
dependencies and their associated build requirements. The scikit-build
package is fundamentally just glue between the setuptools Python module
and CMake.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build

dependent_to.description:
scikit-build-core is a doubly improved build system generator for
CPython C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It features several
improvements over the classic scikit-build build system generator.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build-core

dependent_to.description: Pandas extension arrays for spatial/geometric operations.
dependent_to.name: py-spatialpandas

dependent_to.description: Missing widgets and components for PyQt/PySide
dependent_to.name: py-superqt

dependent_to.description:
Unified Histogram Interface: tools to help library authors work with
histograms
dependent_to.name: py-uhi

dependent_to.description: Vector classes and utilities
dependent_to.name: py-vector

dependent_to.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.
dependent_to.name: py-virtualenv

dependent_to.description:
Zarr is a Python package providing an implementation of chunked,
compressed, N-dimensional arrays.
dependent_to.name: py-zarr

description: Hatch plugin for versioning with your preferred VCS
name: py-hatch-vcs

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
